pageContext.claim: “The media is really, the word, one of the greatest of all terms I've come up with, is 'fake.' I guess other people have used it perhaps over the years but I've never noticed it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims he created the term "fake news," which dates to the 19th century. Another reading of this claim may be that Trump claimed he created the word "fake," which, of course, is not the case.
